parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs. The value of this parameter must be the same as the application name in the ingest URL. Otherwise, the configuration does not take effect. The application name is case-sensitive.

parameters.name: BizType
parameters.description: The business type. You can specify a model. The default value is the domain name.

parameters.name: OssBucket
parameters.description: The name of the Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket.

parameters.name: OssEndpoint
parameters.description: The endpoint of the OSS bucket.

parameters.name: OssObject
parameters.description: The name of the recording that is stored in OSS.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the live stream. The value of this parameter must be the same as the stream name in the ingest URL. Otherwise, the configuration does not take effect. The stream name is case-sensitive.
